page.title: 13 Events
page.content: {Evening Classes:}Evening classes are held in the school. They include; Yoga Pottery, Keep Fit, Lacemaking, Soft Furnishing, Folk Guitar, French, Aerobics and WEA courses about the surrounding area. The{Drama Club}run by Dr.Brown puts on 2 performances a year using the stage in the Village Hall. Mr.Fearn is chairman of the Village Hall Commitee. The Playing Field Commitee hold an annual Gala on the playing field in June. Many people own horses and the Gymkhanas and treasure hunts organised by the Pony Club are well supported. In the spring the VPA hold a flower show and a produce show later in the year. An annual sponsored walk held by the Heart Foundation raises a considerable amount of money.
